title: I Don’t See Flowers and Coins and Teeth on the Shroud of Turin
post: Whilst making my breakfast this morning, to my astonishment as I pulled the second piece of toast out of the toaster, I saw the face of Dan Porter, clear as day!….But seriously, although I agree mostly with the article, I have to admit I see objects on the eyes! Forget the different photo film types, as it appears in the VP-8 renderings very clear.Would be nice if they had a way to enhance the vp-8 images detail to finally clear this up.
author: Flagrum3
